mapper.select: SELECT distinct a."object_id" FROM "apartment" a JOIN "apartment_attribute" num ON (num."object_id" = a."object_id" AND num."status" = 1 AND num."entity_attribute_id" = 100) JOIN "apartment_string_value" num_sc ON (num_sc."id" = num."value_id") WHERE a."status" = 1 AND num_sc."value" = #{number} AND a."parent_id" = #{buildingId}
